results.title: Metformin suppresses colorectal aberrant crypt foci in a short-term clinical trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppresses @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal aberrant@@@ crypt @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy_Partial_with_Variable_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565785 @@@foci@@@ in a short-term clinical trial.

results.title: Metformin as an antitumor agent in cancer prevention and treatment.
results.text_hl: In addition, a recent clinical trial has shown that short-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces aberrant crypt @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy_Partial_with_Variable_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565785 @@@foci@@@ (@DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@) formation in non-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@.
